Entries.DialogueText: My dear boy...
Entries.DisplayPattern: My dear boy...

Entries.DialogueText: My dearest grand-daughter...
Entries.DisplayPattern: My dearest grand-daughter...

Entries.DialogueText: It's been many years since we last spoke. You were just a little boy... Do you remember?
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's been many years since we last spoke. You were just a little boy... Do you remember?

Entries.DialogueText: It's been many years since we last spoke. You were just a little girl... Do you remember?
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's been many years since we last spoke. You were just a little girl... Do you remember?

Entries.DialogueText: Look how far you've come!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Look how far you've come!

Entries.DialogueText: Though you may have forgotten me, I've been here all along.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Though you may have forgotten me, I've been here all along.

Entries.DialogueText: You see... My body has departed this world, but my heart will always remain in Stardew Valley.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You see... My body has departed this world, but my heart will always remain in Stardew Valley.

Entries.DialogueText: You've been here two years now...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've been here two years now...

Entries.DialogueText: The future of %farm Farm is in your hands, now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The future of is in your hands, now.

Entries.DialogueText: Farewell!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Farewell!

Entries.DialogueText: My dear boy...
Entries.DisplayPattern: My dear boy...

Entries.DialogueText: My dearest grand-daughter...
Entries.DisplayPattern: My dearest grand-daughter...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad you summoned me. I... was perhaps a little too harsh with you last time.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad you summoned me. I... was perhaps a little too harsh with you last .

Entries.DialogueText: Forgive me. You've been working very hard, and I'm proud of it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Forgive me. You've been working very hard, and I'm proud of it.

Entries.DialogueText: Let's see...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's see...
